name: Opus One
description: The legendary Bordeaux-style blend born from the partnership of Robert Mondavi and Baron Philippe de Rothschild. Opus One produces a single wine each vintage — a Cabernet Sauvignon-dominant blend from Oakville estate vineyards. The striking architecture and meticulous winemaking make this one of Napa's most prestigious visits.
shortDescription: Legendary Mondavi-Rothschild Bordeaux-style partnership.

wines.name: Opus One 2022
wines.description: A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Cabernet Franc, Petit Verdot, and Malbec from Oakville estate vineyards. Opulent dark fruit, silk tannins, and extraordinary length.

wines.name: Overture 2022
wines.description: A multi-vintage blend showcasing the diversity of Opus One's estate vineyards. Accessible and elegant, meant to be enjoyed upon release.

tastings.name: Estate Tasting
tastings.description: Seated tasting of the current vintage of Opus One with views of the estate vineyards.
tastings.includes: 1 glass of current vintage Opus One

tastings.name: Opus One Experience
tastings.description: Guided experience featuring the current and a library vintage of Opus One in an intimate setting.
tastings.includes: 2 vintages of Opus One, guided by an estate host

tastings.name: Art of the Table
tastings.description: An exclusive culinary and wine experience pairing Opus One with a multi-course menu.
tastings.includes: Multi-course meal with Opus One pairings

name: Robert Mondavi Winery
description: The winery that pioneered modern Napa Valley winemaking. Founded in 1966 by Robert Mondavi, the iconic mission-style architecture and To Kalon Vineyard produce some of California's most celebrated wines. Note: the Oakville estate is currently closed for renovations until Spring 2026; tastings are hosted at Arch & Tower in downtown Napa.
shortDescription: Pioneer of modern Napa Valley winemaking.

wines.name: To Kalon Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
wines.description: Flagship Cabernet from the legendary To Kalon Vineyard. Rich blackcurrant, cedar, and graphite with firm, fine-grained tannins.

wines.name: Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2019
wines.description: A selection of the finest lots from Napa Valley. Deep, concentrated dark fruit with elegant structure and aging potential.

wines.name: Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2022
wines.description: Classic Napa Cabernet with ripe cherry, plum, and hints of vanilla from oak aging. Approachable yet structured.

wines.name: Fumé Blanc 2023
wines.description: Mondavi's signature Sauvignon Blanc, the wine that made the varietal famous in California. Citrus, melon, and subtle herbaceous notes.

wines.name: Napa Valley Chardonnay 2022
wines.description: Balanced and elegant with apple, pear, and light oak. A versatile wine for any occasion.

wines.name: Napa Valley Pinot Noir 2021
wines.description: Silky and aromatic with cherry, raspberry, and subtle earthy undertones.

tastings.name: Napa Discovery Tour & Tasting
tastings.description: Introduction to the Mondavi legacy with a guided tour and tasting of current releases.

tastings.name: Estate Experience
tastings.description: In-depth exploration of the estate with a seated tasting of reserve wines.

tastings.name: To Kalon Reserve Tasting
tastings.description: Exclusive seated tasting featuring To Kalon Vineyard and reserve Cabernets.
tastings.includes: 4-5 reserve wines including To Kalon Cabernet

name: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars
description: The legendary estate whose 1973 S.L.V. Cabernet Sauvignon triumphed at the 1976 Judgment of Paris, reshaping the global wine world. Today, CASK 23 and S.L.V. remain among Napa's most coveted Cabernets. The FAY Outlook & Vineyard visit offers panoramic views of the Stags Leap palisades.
shortDescription: 1976 Judgment of Paris winner.

wines.name: CASK 23 Cabernet Sauvignon 2020
wines.description: The estate's flagship blend of SLV and FAY vineyards. Profound depth with blackberry, cassis, and a signature mineral finish from the volcanic soils.

wines.name: S.L.V. Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
wines.description: From the vineyard that won the Judgment of Paris. Structured and age-worthy with dark plum, graphite, and fine tannins.

wines.name: FAY Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
wines.description: Elegant and floral from Nathan Fay's original vineyard. Red fruit, violet, and silky tannins with beautiful poise.

wines.name: ARTEMIS Cabernet Sauvignon 2022
wines.description: Napa Valley Cabernet blending fruit from the estate and select vineyards. Ripe cherry, mocha, and accessible tannins.

wines.name: AVETA Sauvignon Blanc 2023
wines.description: Bright and refreshing with citrus, white peach, and crisp acidity. A perfect patio wine.

wines.name: KARIA Chardonnay 2023
wines.description: Elegant Napa Chardonnay with apple, pear, and subtle oak. Balanced and food-friendly.

tastings.name: Signature Tasting
tastings.description: Seated tasting on the terrace featuring ARTEMIS, AVETA, and KARIA alongside an estate Cabernet.

tastings.name: Estate Experience
tastings.description: Walk through FAY Vineyard to the outlook with panoramic views, followed by a seated tasting of estate wines including S.L.V. and FAY.
tastings.includes: Vineyard walk, 5 wines including single-vineyard Cabernets

tastings.name: Collector's Tasting
tastings.description: Exclusive cellar visit and seated tasting featuring CASK 23 alongside library vintages.
tastings.includes: Cellar tour, CASK 23 plus 2 library wines

name: Silver Oak Cellars
description: Dedicated exclusively to Cabernet Sauvignon since 1972, Silver Oak ages every wine in American oak barrels for a distinctive vanilla and coconut character. The LEED Platinum Alexander Valley winery and the Oakville tasting room both offer memorable visits focused on the art of Cabernet.
shortDescription: Cabernet Sauvignon specialists aged in American oak.

wines.name: Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
wines.description: Rich and velvety with cassis, dark cherry, and signature American oak vanilla. Aged 24 months in new American oak.

wines.name: Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
wines.description: Vibrant and fruit-forward with ripe plum, blackberry, and coconut from American oak aging. Approachable upon release.

wines.name: Twomey Sauvignon Blanc 2024
wines.description: Crisp and aromatic with grapefruit, Meyer lemon, and fresh herbs. Estate-grown from Napa Carneros.

wines.name: Twomey Pinot Noir 2023
wines.description: Russian River Valley Pinot with cherry, raspberry, and subtle spice. Elegant and silky.

tastings.name: The Silver Tour
tastings.description: Guided tour and tasting of Silver Oak and Twomey current releases.
tastings.includes: Tour, 3-4 wines from Silver Oak and Twomey

tastings.name: Silver Oak Tasting
tastings.description: Guided seated tasting of Silver Oak Cabernets and select Twomey wines.

tastings.name: Vertical Tasting
tastings.description: Explore aged Silver Oak Cabernets from the library alongside current releases.

tastings.name: Wine & Food Pairing
tastings.description: Silver Oak wines paired with seasonal bites in an intimate setting.

name: Chateau Montelena
description: The legendary estate that put California wine on the world stage when its 1973 Chardonnay won the 1976 Judgment of Paris. The stone castle dating to 1882, Jade Lake with Chinese gardens, and world-class wines make this one of Napa's most storied destinations.
shortDescription: Historic estate famous for the 1976 Judgment of Paris.

wines.name: Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
wines.description: Flagship estate Cabernet from the rocky benchland of Calistoga. Concentrated dark fruit, tobacco, and firm tannic structure built for aging.

wines.name: Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2022
wines.description: Classic Napa Cabernet with black cherry, cassis, and cocoa. More accessible than the Estate bottling.

wines.name: Napa Valley Chardonnay 2023
wines.description: The wine that won the Judgment of Paris. Crisp and mineral-driven, fermented in stainless steel with no malolactic — a California benchmark.

wines.name: Estate Zinfandel 2022
wines.description: Old-vine Zinfandel from Calistoga. Bold raspberry and pepper with a briary, rustic charm.

wines.name: Potter Valley Riesling 2024
wines.description: Off-dry Riesling with apricot, honey, and bright acidity. A Montelena signature since the 1970s.

wines.name: Napa Valley Sauvignon Blanc 2024
wines.description: Crisp and vibrant with citrus, green apple, and fresh herbaceous notes. A refreshing Calistoga white.

tastings.name: Taste of Montelena
tastings.description: Guided tasting in the historic stone chateau, featuring current release wines.

tastings.name: Story Behind the Bottle
tastings.description: In-depth tasting exploring the history and winemaking of Chateau Montelena.

tastings.name: Estate Walking Tour
tastings.description: Guided walk through the estate grounds and gardens followed by a seated tasting.

tastings.name: Vineyard Tour
tastings.description: Behind-the-scenes vineyard tour exploring terroir and viticulture, with a seated tasting.
tastings.includes: Vineyard tour, 5 wines including Estate Cabernet

tastings.name: Estate Collection
tastings.description: Exclusive tasting featuring library vintages alongside the current Estate Cabernet.
tastings.includes: Estate tour, 4 wines including library Cabernet

tastings.name: Explore Ageability
tastings.description: Guided tasting exploring the aging potential of Montelena wines across multiple vintages.

tastings.name: Legacy in the Glass
tastings.description: Premium tasting of library and reserve wines with an in-depth look at Montelena's legacy.
tastings.includes: 4 library and reserve wines, private experience

name: Domaine Carneros
description: Taittinger's American chateau, modeled after the 18th-century Château de la Marquetterie in Champagne, producing exquisite méthode traditionnelle sparkling wines and Pinot Noir. The grand terrace overlooking Carneros vineyards is one of Napa's most photogenic tasting spots.
shortDescription: Taittinger's elegant American sparkling wine chateau.

wines.name: Le Rêve Blanc de Blancs 2017
wines.description: Flagship tête de cuvée sparkling wine. Elegant and complex with brioche, Meyer lemon, and fine persistent mousse.

wines.name: Le Rêve Rosé 2019
wines.description: Prestige cuvée rosé with delicate salmon hue, red berry, cream, and extraordinary finesse.

wines.name: Blanc de Blancs 2021
wines.description: All Chardonnay sparkling with citrus, white flower, and creamy mousse. Elegant and complex.

wines.name: Brut Rosé 2021
wines.description: Salmon-hued sparkling with fresh strawberry, cream, and a dry, elegant finish.

wines.name: Blanc de Noir NV
wines.description: Pinot Noir-driven sparkling with rich breadth, red fruit, and creamy texture.

wines.name: Estate Brut Cuvée 2021
wines.description: Classic méthode traditionnelle from Chardonnay and Pinot Noir. Green apple, toast, and lively bubbles.

wines.name: Famous Gate Pinot Noir 2022
wines.description: Reserve Pinot Noir from the estate's finest blocks. Complex with dark cherry, truffle, and spice.

wines.name: Estate Pinot Noir 2023
wines.description: Cool-climate Carneros Pinot Noir with cherry, pomegranate, and earthy spice.

wines.name: Avant-Garde Pinot Noir 2023
wines.description: Approachable Pinot Noir with bright red fruit and silky texture. Great everyday wine.

tastings.name: Bubble Room Experience
tastings.description: Seated table-service tasting on the terrace or in the salon, featuring sparkling wines and Pinot Noir.

tastings.name: Le Rêve Tasting
tastings.description: Premium seated tasting featuring the flagship Le Rêve alongside reserve wines.
tastings.includes: 5 wines including Le Rêve, paired bites

tastings.name: Sparkling Wine & Caviar Pairing
tastings.description: Indulgent pairing of estate sparkling wines with sustainably sourced caviar.

name: Inglenook
description: Francis Ford Coppola's iconic Rutherford estate, originally founded in 1879 by Gustave Niebaum. The grand chateau, historic caves, and Rubicon — the estate's legendary Cabernet blend — represent the pinnacle of Rutherford winemaking. Fully restored to its 19th-century grandeur.
shortDescription: Coppola's iconic estate producing legendary Rubicon.

wines.name: Rubicon 2022
wines.description: The flagship estate Bordeaux blend, primarily Cabernet Sauvignon with Merlot, Cabernet Franc, and Petit Verdot. Dark fruit, mineral, and the famous Rutherford dust.

wines.name: Cabernet Sauvignon 2022
wines.description: Estate Cabernet from Rutherford. Blackberry, cedar, and structured tannins.

wines.name: Edizione Pennino Zinfandel 2020
wines.description: Named for Coppola's grandfather. Bold and spicy with dark berry, pepper, and Italian heritage.

wines.name: Blancaneaux 2024
wines.description: Rhône-style white blend of Viognier, Marsanne, and Roussanne. Aromatic with stone fruit and honeysuckle.

wines.name: RC Reserve Syrah 2019
wines.description: Estate Syrah with dark plum, smoked meat, and black pepper. Rich and complex.

wines.name: Sauvignon Blanc 2023
wines.description: Estate-grown Sauvignon Blanc with citrus, melon, and bright acidity. A refreshing Rutherford white.

tastings.name: Heritage Tasting
tastings.description: Seated tasting in the historic chateau featuring estate wines and the story of Inglenook.

tastings.name: Legacy Tasting
tastings.description: Walking tour through the historic chateau, barrel caves, and vineyards followed by a seated tasting of reserve wines.
tastings.includes: Full property tour, 5 wines including Rubicon

name: Caymus Vineyards
description: Founded in 1972 by Chuck Wagner, Caymus is renowned for its rich, opulent Cabernet Sauvignon — particularly the Special Selection, one of Napa's most collected wines. The Wagner family's focus on a single varietal has earned them cult status among Cabernet lovers.
shortDescription: Iconic producer of highly sought Cabernet Sauvignon.

wines.name: Special Selection Cabernet Sauvignon 2019
wines.description: The crown jewel — a selection of the finest barrels. Deep, concentrated, and lush with dark chocolate, blackberry, and cashmere tannins.

wines.name: Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2022
wines.description: Rich and ripe with dark fruit, cocoa, and vanilla. The signature Caymus style: bold, round, and immediately appealing.

wines.name: Caymus-Suisun Grand Durif 2021
wines.description: From Suisun Valley. Inky and bold with blueberry, dark chocolate, and grippy tannins.

tastings.name: Caymus Tasting
tastings.description: Seated tasting of Caymus wines including current release and Special Selection Cabernets.

name: Schramsberg Vineyards
description: America's premier sparkling wine house, founded in 1965 by Jack and Jamie Davies on an estate dating to 1862. Historic hand-dug caves house millions of bottles aging sur lie. Schramsberg has been served at White House state dinners since Nixon's 1972 'Toast to Peace' in Beijing.
shortDescription: Premier sparkling wine house with historic caves.

wines.name: J. Schram Blancs 2016
wines.description: The prestige cuvée — 100% Chardonnay aged 7+ years on the lees. Toasted brioche, lemon curd, and extraordinary complexity.

wines.name: Blanc de Blancs 2022
wines.description: All Chardonnay sparkling with green apple, citrus, and creamy mousse. A benchmark California sparkler.

wines.name: Brut Rosé 2021
wines.description: Salmon-pink with raspberry, strawberry cream, and fine bubbles. Festive and elegant.

wines.name: Blanc de Noirs 2022
wines.description: Pinot Noir-driven sparkling with rich breadth, red fruit, and creamy texture.

wines.name: Mirabelle Brut NV
wines.description: Approachable everyday sparkler with crisp apple, pear, and toasty notes. Excellent value from a premium house.

tastings.name: All Sparkling Tasting
tastings.description: Seated tasting of Schramsberg's sparkling wine portfolio.

tastings.name: Cave Tour & Sparkling Tasting
tastings.description: Tour the historic hand-dug caves dating to the 1800s, learn about méthode traditionnelle, and taste estate sparklers.

tastings.name: Cave Tour — Sparkling & Red
tastings.description: Cave tour with an expanded tasting that includes both sparkling wines and Davies Vineyards reds.
tastings.includes: Cave tour, sparkling wines and red wines

tastings.name: Custom Tasting Only
tastings.description: Personalized tasting tailored to your preferences with guidance from a wine educator, without cave tour.

tastings.name: Custom Tasting
tastings.description: Personalized cave tour and tasting tailored to your preferences with guidance from a wine educator.
tastings.includes: Cave tour, 5-6 wines selected by your host

tastings.name: Sparkling & Red Tasting Only
tastings.description: Seated tasting featuring both Schramsberg sparkling wines and Davies Vineyards reds.

tastings.name: Reserve & Cheese Pairing
tastings.description: Elevated cave tour with an in-depth tasting of the J. Schram prestige cuvée alongside reserve bottlings and artisan cheese.
tastings.includes: Cave tour, 5 wines including J. Schram, cheese pairings

name: Domaine Chandon
description: LVMH's California sparkling wine house, established in 1973 as the first French-owned sparkling wine venture in Napa. The stunning modern estate in Yountville features beautiful grounds, a restaurant, and an extensive range of still and sparkling wines.
shortDescription: LVMH's elegant sparkling wine house.

wines.name: Chandon Étoile Brut NV
wines.description: Prestige cuvée with extended aging. Rich and complex with brioche, apple, and nutty notes.

wines.name: Étoile Rosé NV
wines.description: Prestige rosé cuvée with strawberry, cream, and elegant complexity. Extended aging on the lees.

wines.name: Chandon Brut NV
wines.description: The signature sparkler — crisp green apple, pear, and fine bubbles. Widely available and consistently excellent.

wines.name: Chandon Brut Rosé NV
wines.description: Delicate pink sparkler with strawberry, peach, and a dry, refreshing finish.

wines.name: Reserve Blanc de Blancs NV
wines.description: All Chardonnay with citrus, white flower, and creamy mousse. Elegant and versatile.

wines.name: Garden Spritz NV
wines.description: A lighter, lower-alcohol sparkling with orange blossom, white peach, and a hint of bitterness. Aperitivo-style.

wines.name: Chandon Sweet Star NV
wines.description: Slightly sweet sparkling with ripe peach, mango, and tropical notes. Fun and festive.

wines.name: Chardonnay Carneros 2020
wines.description: Still Chardonnay from Carneros vineyards. Apple, pear, and subtle oak with bright acidity.

wines.name: Pinot Noir Carneros 2020
wines.description: Still Pinot Noir from cool-climate Carneros. Cherry, pomegranate, and earthy spice.

wines.name: Cabernet Sauvignon Yountville 2020
wines.description: Yountville Cabernet with dark cherry, cassis, and fine tannins. A departure from Chandon's sparkling heritage.

tastings.name: Weekday Wine Flight
tastings.description: Casual seated tasting of sparkling and still wines on the terrace or salon.

tastings.name: Signature Tasting Flight
tastings.description: Guided tasting of reserve and limited-production wines with a dedicated host.

tastings.name: Pinnacle Tasting Flight
tastings.description: Premium guided tasting featuring Étoile and top-tier cuvées in an intimate setting.
tastings.includes: 5 wines including Étoile and prestige cuvées

tastings.name: Fried Chicken & Fizz
tastings.description: A fun pairing of Chandon sparkling wines with gourmet fried chicken bites.
tastings.includes: Sparkling wines paired with fried chicken courses

name: Williams Selyem
description: One of California's most revered Pinot Noir producers, founded in 1981 by Burt Williams and Ed Selyem. Known for single-vineyard designations from legendary sites like Rochioli, Allen, and Hirsch. The mailing list has years-long waitlists. Tastings are available exclusively for active list members by appointment.
shortDescription: Cult Pinot Noir producer with legendary waitlist.

wines.name: Rochioli Riverblock Vineyard Pinot Noir 2023
wines.description: From a legendary vineyard block. Ethereal red cherry, rose petal, and forest floor with extraordinary finesse.

wines.name: Allen Vineyard Pinot Noir 2023
wines.description: Rich and concentrated from one of Russian River's finest vineyards. Dark cherry, cola, and savory spice.

wines.name: Westside Road Neighbors Pinot Noir 2024
wines.description: A multi-vineyard blend showcasing Russian River character. Bright cherry, cranberry, and earthy notes.

wines.name: Sonoma Coast Pinot Noir 2024
wines.description: Cool-climate Pinot with red plum, wild strawberry, and coastal minerality.

wines.name: Estate Vineyard Chardonnay 2023
wines.description: Estate-grown Chardonnay with Burgundian elegance. Citrus, wet stone, and restrained oak.

wines.name: Drake Estate Vineyard Chardonnay 2024
wines.description: Single-vineyard Chardonnay from a historic Russian River site. Meyer lemon, hazelnut, and beautiful acidity.

wines.name: Papera Vineyard Zinfandel 2024
wines.description: Old-vine Russian River Zinfandel with boysenberry, pepper, and rustic charm.

tastings.name: Estate Tasting
tastings.description: Seated tasting at the estate winery on Westside Road, featuring single-vineyard Pinot Noirs and Chardonnays. Available exclusively for active list members.

tastings.name: Vineyard Walk & Tasting
tastings.description: Guided walk through the estate vineyard followed by a seated tasting of reserve wines. Active list members only.
tastings.includes: Vineyard tour, 6 wines including single-vineyard designations

name: Jordan Vineyard & Winery
description: A French-inspired chateau in Alexander Valley producing elegant Cabernet Sauvignon and Chardonnay since 1972. Founded by Tom and Sally Jordan, the estate emphasizes balance and restraint over power. The 1,200-acre property offers one of Sonoma's most memorable tasting experiences with estate tours, hikes, and seasonal food pairings.
shortDescription: French-inspired chateau with elegant wines.

wines.name: Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
wines.description: Elegant and restrained Cabernet in the Bordeaux tradition. Blackberry, cedar, and dried herbs with supple tannins. Aged 12 months in French oak.

wines.name: Russian River Valley Chardonnay 2023
wines.description: Burgundy-inspired Chardonnay with apple, pear, and delicate oak. Bright acidity and clean finish.

tastings.name: A Taste of Jordan
tastings.description: Signature seated tasting of Jordan wines with seasonal food pairings.

tastings.name: Winery Tour & Tasting
tastings.description: Guided tour of the chateau, vineyard, and production facilities followed by a seated tasting with food pairings.
tastings.includes: Estate tour, 4 wines, seasonal food pairings

tastings.name: Chef's Terrace Tasting
tastings.description: Seasonal al fresco tasting on the terrace with wines paired to chef-prepared courses.
tastings.includes: Terrace seating, wines with multi-course bites

tastings.name: Estate Tour & Tasting
tastings.description: Luxury wine tour of the breathtaking 1,200-acre Jordan Estate with food and wine pairing.
tastings.includes: Full estate tour, wines, seasonal chef's lunch

name: Gloria Ferrer Caves & Vineyards
description: Founded in 1986 by the Ferrer family of Spain (Freixenet), Gloria Ferrer brings centuries of Catalan sparkling wine tradition to Sonoma's Carneros region. The hilltop terrace offers sweeping vineyard views, and the caves house thousands of bottles aging en tirage. One of Sonoma's best values for quality sparkling wine.
shortDescription: Spanish sparkling house with Carneros views.

wines.name: Royal Cuvée Brut 2016
wines.description: Premium méthode traditionnelle with extended aging. Rich toast, green apple, and lemon zest with fine bubbles.

wines.name: Sonoma Brut NV
wines.description: Classic Carneros sparkling with crisp apple, pear, and a creamy finish. Outstanding value.

wines.name: Blanc de Noirs NV
wines.description: Pinot Noir-driven sparkling with strawberry, cherry, and bread dough richness.

wines.name: Va de Vi Sparkling Rosé NV
wines.description: Salmon-pink with fresh raspberry, citrus, and dry effervescence. Named for the Catalan toast 'It comes from wine.'

wines.name: Carneros Pinot Noir 2022
wines.description: Cool-climate Pinot with cherry, earth, and gentle spice. Elegant and food-friendly.

wines.name: Carneros Chardonnay 2021
wines.description: Bright and clean with apple, citrus, and minimal oak. True Carneros character.

tastings.name: Taste of Carneros
tastings.description: Introductory tasting of estate sparkling wines and still wines on the terrace.

tastings.name: Reserve Expedition
tastings.description: Seated guided tasting exploring reserve and estate wines on the terrace with panoramic vineyard views.

tastings.name: Culinary Journey
tastings.description: Sparkling wines and Pinot Noir paired with seasonal culinary bites from the chef.

name: Ridge Vineyards (Lytton Springs)
description: The Sonoma outpost of legendary Ridge Vineyards, home to the iconic Lytton Springs Zinfandel blend. Old-vine vineyards dating to the 1900s produce some of California's most profound and age-worthy Zinfandel-based wines. The tasting room offers appointment-based seated tastings — a pilgrimage site for Zinfandel lovers.
shortDescription: Legendary producer of Lytton Springs Zinfandel.

wines.name: Lytton Springs 2023
wines.description: Flagship blend of old-vine Zinfandel, Petite Sirah, and Carignane from vines planted in the 1900s. Dark berry, pepper, and mineral with remarkable structure.

wines.name: Geyserville 2023
wines.description: Alexander Valley field blend of Zinfandel, Carignane, and Petite Sirah. Bright fruit with spice and a long, silky finish.

wines.name: Monte Bello 2022
wines.description: The flagship from Monte Bello Ridge (Santa Cruz). One of California's greatest Cabernets — structured, mineral, and built for decades.

wines.name: Three Valleys 2023
wines.description: Approachable Sonoma County Zinfandel blend. Bright raspberry, cherry, and peppery spice. Excellent everyday value.

wines.name: Estate Chardonnay 2023
wines.description: Monte Bello estate Chardonnay. Citrus, mineral, and restrained oak with beautiful acidity.

tastings.name: Estate Tasting
tastings.description: Appointment-based seated tasting featuring single-vineyard wines from Sonoma County and the Santa Cruz Mountains.

tastings.name: Beautiful Mountain: Monte Bello Cabernet Tasting
tastings.description: Seated tasting featuring the Monte Bello Cabernet alongside Lytton Springs and Geyserville.

tastings.name: Century Tour & Library Tasting
tastings.description: Guided tour of the historic vineyards and cellar followed by a tasting of library wines.

tastings.name: From Vine to Table
tastings.description: Immersive food and wine pairing experience featuring Ridge wines with seasonal dishes.

name: Buena Vista Winery
description: California's oldest premium winery, founded in 1857 by Count Agoston Haraszthy, the 'Father of California Viticulture.' The historic stone cellars and press house in Sonoma are a state landmark. Now owned by Boisset Collection, Buena Vista combines 160+ years of history with approachable, well-priced wines.
shortDescription: California's oldest premium winery since 1857.

wines.name: The Count Red Blend 2020
wines.description: Flagship blend honoring founder Count Haraszthy. Zinfandel-driven with Merlot and Syrah — rich dark fruit, mocha, and firm tannins.

wines.name: Sonoma Cabernet Sauvignon 2020
wines.description: Approachable Sonoma Cabernet with black cherry, plum, and soft oak. Great everyday red.

wines.name: Carneros Chardonnay 2022
wines.description: Bright and clean with green apple, pear, and subtle cream. Cool-climate Carneros character.

wines.name: Carneros Pinot Noir 2021
wines.description: Elegant Pinot with cherry, strawberry, and earthy undertones. Excellent value.

wines.name: North Coast Syrah 2020
wines.description: Dark and savory with blackberry, smoked meat, and pepper. Approachable and well-priced.

wines.name: Sonoma Rosé 2023
wines.description: Dry and refreshing with watermelon, citrus, and fresh herbs. Perfect patio wine.

tastings.name: Current Release Tasting
tastings.description: Seated tasting in the historic press house featuring a curated selection of current release wines.

tastings.name: Barrel Tasting & Winery Tour
tastings.description: Guided tour of the 1857 stone cellars and historic caves with barrel tasting, followed by a tasting of reserve wines.
tastings.includes: Winery tour, barrel tasting, 5 wines including reserve selections

tastings.name: Private Experience
tastings.description: Exclusive private tasting in the historic tasting room with wines paired to artisan cheeses and charcuterie.
tastings.includes: 4 wines, cheese and charcuterie board, private setting

name: Sterling Vineyards
description: Mountaintop winery accessible by aerial tram with panoramic views of Napa Valley.
shortDescription: Iconic hilltop winery with aerial tram access.

wines.name: Sterling Cabernet Sauvignon
wines.description: Full-bodied with dark fruit, firm tannins, and notes of cedar and blackcurrant.

wines.name: Sterling Merlot
wines.description: Smooth and approachable with plum, black cherry, and soft tannins.

wines.name: Sterling Chardonnay
wines.description: Rich and buttery with tropical fruit, vanilla, and toasty oak notes.

tastings.name: Estate Tasting
tastings.description: Premium estate wines with cheese pairing

name: Castello di Amorosa
description: Authentically built 13th-century Tuscan castle and winery featuring Italian varietals and blends.
shortDescription: A 13th-century Tuscan castle winery in Calistoga.

wines.name: Castello Cabernet Sauvignon
wines.description: Full-bodied with dark fruit, firm tannins, and notes of cedar and blackcurrant.

wines.name: Castello Merlot
wines.description: Smooth and approachable with plum, black cherry, and soft tannins.

wines.name: Castello Pinot Grigio
